message.content: This question requires knowledge about how animals, specifically cats, may react to sudden changes in temperature. When the temperature drops, the cat's body may experience involuntary body tremors and shudders as a way to generate heat and keep warm. This is a physiological response to the change in temperature. Options (A), (C), and (D) are unrelated to the physical reaction of a cat to a change in temperature.
